snippet.title: DCS: AH-64D  Four Horsemen Campaign
snippet.description:
I am pleased to announce the DCS: AH-64D The Four Horsemen Campaign is nearing completion. Here's a chance to see what you can expect to see.

Follow the Four Horsemen - Dim, Foghorn, Belly and Gonville as the battle to overcome forces of evil, through 12 missions. The campaign includes associated documentation and over 2000 original voice files. 

For more info, a chance to play M1 for free, head over to the Fight's On Sims discord  
 / discord
